DataElement.preferredName: Patient Randomization Delay Reason Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to describe reason not listed as to why patient's randomization callback was delayed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment._Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.:The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.

An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.
